name: Spin the Room
description:
SPIN THE ROOM is a hyper-casual is a relaxing light puzzle game with rotatable environments and physics mechanics.

Our goey little friend is trapped in small bottles through mysterious rotatable structures. Spin the rooms around and find a way to break the bottles to release him and get him to his favorite and cozy blue couch.

THE CONTROLS; Arrows on [PC] and Left/Right tap on [ANDROID]

Available to play through a web browser (click on Run Game above) or download the APK file bellow to install it on a android device.
